channel.title: Client problem?
channel.description:
Okay, when i start the client and my server and login, I get this, "Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "cancel" Then "Start server" to make your own.
What can be the problem. This happens when I leave the I.P. blank or when I put 127.0.0.1 in. And it also happens on the client I downloaded from mopar, and the client in the web browser.
Thanks in advance

item.title: Client problem?
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Either your no-ip is disabled or you portfowarded it wrong

Read full topic
